author: Daniel Greene
description:
The Wheel of Time Season 3 bonus episode dropped, and we’re diving into all the reveals, deep lore, and teases for what’s coming! Big thank you to Squarespace for sponsoring today's video. Be sure to checkout https://www.squarespace.com/danielgreene 

Join me as I break down every detail, analyze the implications for Season 3, and give my reaction to what Amazon Prime is bringing to The Wheel of Time. Are we getting closer to the Shadow Rising storyline? Will fan-favorite moments from the books make the cut? Let’s discuss!

📢 Let me know YOUR thoughts in the comments! What did you love? What worried you? What are you hoping to see in Season 3?

title: Wheel of Time Season 3 Bonus Episode Reaction – HUGE Surprises & New Reveals!
